name: Mojtaba Akbarpour Khomami
title: Backend Developer
skills: Familiar with database management systems, including MySQL
Experience in front-end development, including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Knowledgeable in version control systems, including Git
Familiar with agile methodologies, including Scrum
about: I am a skilled PHP developer with expertise in Laravel framework. I have worked on several projects where I was responsible for the backend development and database management. I have experience in developing solutions for e-commerce, including product management, categories, discounts, orders, pre-orders, and shipping costs. In addition to my technical skills, I also have a passion for mentoring junior developers and enjoy working as part of a team.

workExperience.description: Shahrara Company is an active company in creating smart and creative solutions in the digital world. Using the latest technologies and its more than ten years of experience, the company aims to help various brands establish their presence by producing websites and apps.
responsibilities: Developed and maintained e-commerce websites using Laravel framework
Created and managed databases using MySQL
Collaborated with front-end developers to ensure seamless integration between front-end and back-end systems
Implemented features such as product management, categories, discounts, orders and pre-orders, and shipping costs

projects.title: Banan Bakery
projects.description: Developed an e-commerce website for a bakery using Laravel framework. Implemented features such as product management, categories, discounts, orders and pre-orders, and shipping costs.

projects.title: Rahnama Fish
projects.description: Developed an e-commerce website for a seafood store using Laravel framework. Implemented features such as product management, categories, discounts, orders and pre-orders, and shipping costs.

projects.title: Ninilos
projects.description: Developed an e-commerce website for a children's clothing store using Laravel framework. Implemented features such as product management, categories, discounts, orders and pre-orders, and shipping costs.

otherProjects: Other digital solutions for well-known brands: Worked on various projects for well-known brands, including Razeghi (https://webapp.razeghigroup.com/) is an app for ordering food from the Razeghi restaurant, Narenj (https://webapp.narenj.me/) is an app designed as a marketplace for stores to showcase their products, and Dryvity (https://dryvity.ir/) is a website for purchasing products such as pistachios, dried fruits, and more. Developed backend solutions using Laravel framework.
